page.title: 02BIRMINGHAM
page.content: Birmingham mainly tries to attract the business tourism.It has about #300 million to use on:a)Manufacturing and company meetings and b)on developing services such as hotels,conferences and shopping. Birmingham is good for business meetings as it is central,easy to reach;has the best conference centre, the National Exhibition Centre. Birmingham also has a bureau for booking hotels,conferences etc.through. The type of people who come to Birmingham are:85% UK,5% North American 5% North Europe and 5% other. The money spent for tourists are:#200 million for business,#100 million for non-business and #300 million for one day tourists. Abroad,Birmingham has travel marketing in North America,Europe and the UK.
